reapack.name: ReaSeth ReaScripts
reapack.desc: Custom REAPER scripts by Seth for workflow enhancement

metadata.description:
**ReaSeth ReaScripts**
A growing collection of REAPER scripts by Seth, designed to streamline everyday production, composition, and mixing tasks. Each script is purpose-built to simplify complex workflows without adding clutter.
### Highlights: - Precision tools for editing, automation, and routing - Designed with speed, clarity, and minimal UI interruption - In-script comments and modular structure for easy customization
Perfect for anyone who wants REAPER to move as fast as their ideas.
For updates, installation tips, or source code, visit the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/your-username/your-repo).

**ReaSeth ReaPack Repository**
This is the official ReaPack repository for ReaSeth â€” a curated suite of REAPER scripts and tools crafted by Seth to boost speed, workflow, and creativity.
Whether you're composing, mixing, editing, or sound designing, ReaSeth scripts aim to minimize friction and help you focus on what matters: the music.
### Repository Features: - Organized by category for intuitive browsing - Includes clean metadata and documentation - Fully compatible with ReaPack installation and updates
### How to Use: 1. Add this URL to ReaPack: 2. Browse and install directly inside REAPER. 3. Updates are fetched automatically via ReaPack.
[Learn more about packaging scripts for ReaPack](https://github.com/cfillion/reapack-index/wiki/Packaging-Documentation)
